ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have taqwa of Allah and do not dishonour me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And do not disgrace me. Have some fear of God."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have fear of Allah, and do not humiliate me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have fear of God and do not humiliate me".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And fear Allah and do not disgrace me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And have Taqwa of Allah, and do not disgrace me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And guard against (the punishment of) Allah and do not put me to shame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and fear God, and do not degrade me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And keep your duty to Allah, and shame me not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Fear God and do not shame me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And fear Allah, and humiliate me not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Be wary of Allah and do not humiliate me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But fear Allah, and shame me not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And fear Allah and disgrace me not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Fear Allah and do not disgrace me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And fear God, and do not disgrace me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:69] and fear God, and do not humiliate me’, by seeking them to commit an abomination with them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And keep your duty to Allah) fear Allah concerning that which is forbidden, (and shame me not!) do not humiliate me in front of my guests.
